website_summaries.verdict: This unisole wrestling trainer delivers a reliable grip on the mat. Its use of flexible materials makes it possible for wearers to move nimbly on the mat so they can get the upper hand or avoid being taken down.The top is crafted to deliver support and comfort. It uses mesh for breathability while the TPU reinforcements enhance durability and foothold. It comes highly recommended by folks who have been using it for years regularly.
pros: A majority of the owners like how their feet feel while wearing the Adidas Mat Wizard David Taylor
According to almost all of the athletes, the outsole was very grippy on various surfaces, including wrestling mats, boxing rings, and gym floors
The snug fit afforded by the upper is much appreciated by many users
A lot of people forget they are wearing this pair of Adidas wrestling shoes because it feels very light
Several buyers are satisfied with the arch support in this trainer
This footgear is described as good-looking by plenty of shoppers
cons: Some athletes have complained that the outsole split under the forefoot after a few weeks of use
The laces on the Mat Wizard David Taylor are too long, says a few customers

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit; they just don't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, a first-time wrestler at the beginning of the season. They had good reviews, the price was decent, and they worked with his team colors, so I thought it was a good idea. Well, it was - sorta. He liked the fit, and the way they felt on his feet. However, by League Finals, there was a huge rip in the sole, and no reason for it, as he wears them only indoors in wrestling rooms, on mats, and on gym floors. Now he's off to playoffs, and I'm scrambling to find him a new pair! So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Push Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for boxing support
customer_reviews.text: As a female boxer, it's tough to find shoes for workouts. I needed a new pair and after trying 4 different pairs, these were the winner. They aren't quite smooth enough for the ring but great for a bag workout of boxing class.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Montrose

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I am a powerlifter and needed a good pair of deadlift shoes that I can also squat in. I love training barefoot, many may not agree or like that, but I love it. and this is the closest thing to training like that when in the gym. The fit was a bit too snug but as I adjusted the laces, I was good to go. All in all, I have had no issues with it, and will probably buy another color for style
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Just wish they had smaller sizes for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Giving 5 stars because some of my other wrestlers use them and they are great. But the smallest size was way too big for y 6 year old son. I REALLY wish Adidas made smaller sizes in more varieties!! I would say they run about 1/2 size too big. Highly recommended for older kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Good competition shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good competition shoes. I wouldn't recommend them for practice. Like most Adidas wrestling shoes they are comfortable and look great but the build quality is low. After only a few practices as a coach they are coming apart where the sole meets the side. I expect after a season of use they will need to be taped or glued if I want to continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick McDuffee

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I workout in these. I have ultra wide feet. That being said I needed a wide shoe. These are good but if you’ve got Fred flinstone feet like me go one width wider. But otherwise they are good.
customer_reviews.author: borda7

customer_reviews.title: These shoes feel amazing, they are incredibly light on your feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel amazing, they are incredibly light on your feet, with solid grip, I wish I went a half a size smaller as it feels like adidas run just a tad bit bigger than my feet, but nothing really too noticeable with solid socks! definitely recommend these shoes. Plus the color scheme is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointed. One time use only!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe’s insoles ripped after my son wore them for one practice. The company’s policy is you do not get a refund if the shoe is worn once no exceptions, which is disappointing. So you’re out the full amount with shoes that can’t be worn after one use. Not worth the money. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: I suggest. BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: They fit amazing. The shoe-laces are pretty long so unless you lace them all the way to the top you will have to double knot & tuck them in. Other than that, I LOVE EM. I needed to really shine this year as it is my senior year, I did a lace swap to give them a shine and they’re amazing. The first tournament was Saturday & I debuted the shoes and ended up going 5-1.
customer_reviews.author: K.J Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my grandson who takes boxing classes a few times a week. He liked them so much I bought my son-in-law the same pair!
customer_reviews.author: Mel from Redlands

customer_reviews.title: Shoes of youth!
customer_reviews.text: These babies take me back to a time when my physical prowess was second to none, and when back hair was still new to me. Now that I’ve let myself go, and allowed a forest of hair inhabit my body, I know I can get it all back with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted stanek 2

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected I wear a size 10-1/2 and they fit perfect. I use them for kickboxing training and strength training. This was the first pair I didn't have to return due to wrong fit. I would give a five but the comfort level is a 4. But for wrestling they are probably a good comfort fit. I can say I do like the shoe and they seem like they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Don Niam

customer_reviews.title: Most wonderful experience ever
customer_reviews.text: Most wonderful experience ever!! My son lost his wrestling shoes and had a few days until his match. He wears a size 15 so finding these in store is a no no. I came online expecting to pay out the wazoo for some shoes and came across this godsend. I will definitely be ordering more sports equipment from these guys/gals!!! Thank u!
customer_reviews.author: Britni S.

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my high school son and he loves them. He needed the higher support up the arch and these do not diappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I’ll always buy Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: Adidas wrestling shoes have been the best wrestling shoe for my feet. Very comfortable, lightweight, and durable enough. I don’t expect them to last 10 years but these might! They are used for running, wrestling, and lifting. Like I said, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy we chose this pair. Read a lot of reviews and this pair has worked really well so far this season.
customer_reviews.author: Familyx6

customer_reviews.title: Great for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for powerlifting. While the full tread isn’t best for wrestling, it certainly works for lifting and walking around the gym. Bought a half size large because I have wide feet, should have respected others reviews and stayed with my normal size - provided just a bit too much room at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: They are great. Have good grip and are comfy
customer_reviews.text: I use them for deadlifting. They are great. Have good grip and are comfy. My only complaint is that I had to order a size up (based on review suggestions). It was the right move as they are narrow and would only fit a size up but are now a bit long and have to change into different shoes to finish my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K

customer_reviews.title: Great wrestling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Middle School and High School Wrestling Coach. I’ve put a ton of hours in these shoes with beginners up to state placers. These shoes have held up for years and I’ve had no issues with them! Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: GLeatherman90010

customer_reviews.title: Great mat shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands of mat shoe for many years. These are more durable than most and also provide good ankle support. Not as flexible if that is a priority.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good wide shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good wide shoe. I said fit as expected because other buyers said it was big, so I expected it to be big. I bought my regular size, and it fits my wide foot very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: 2 years in now and they are outlasting some of the more expensive shoes :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good show has stood up through a month of practice. We’ll see how it goes from here
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cox

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, especially for the price! Fits true to size. I surprised my son with them and he absolutely loves them. He says they are very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for boxing, but get 1 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, especially since I have wider feet. I use this for boxing. I had to get 1 full size smaller though for that snug fit. I usually wear 10.5, had to get 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hui

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe and my son says it fits well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe and my son says it fits well. It comes with the world's longest shoe laces, so pick up some athletic tape to keep those in check.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Received an A+ from not only my son, but his coach as well. Fit perfectly. Awesome quality. Grip and stability all exceptional. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son has used them for approximately 8 practices and 1 tournament and the toe cap is shot already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent Shoe. I use it for weight training and ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent Shoe. I use it for weight training and powerlifting. hoe is very soft inside with a solid bottom and no cloth on soles making it a decent option for walking to the gym from your car, even in the rain. I used XPand laces on these shoes and they come off very easily when needed but still have excellent support. These are cheaper than any training shoe by Nike/ etc and beat them for looks and function.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Davydov

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe and quality.. I coach youth wrestling and these have lasted 2 years and the tread is 70%. I paid $40 for these shoes and they are still holding up. I like the sole because it has support 5/8 the length of the sole. I broke my foot a few years ago and this helps support my foot. It is a good shoe for $40
customer_reviews.author: justin pendergrast

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service & price! I only wish they would have fit my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: Great all around!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes on a Tuesday and they were waiting on my porch on Thursday! They look great and my husband, who’s been wrestling since he was 3 and is now a wrestling coach, says they are his favorite wrestling shoes he’s ever had. We are very pleased with the fast shipping and the product it’s self!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and look, but the rubber sole did not last. I box on my toes and i have a hole in the right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Str8Beastin

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a female who wears these types of shoes I have 4 pair between Adidas and nike. These are one of the cutest thanks..I want black too.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUILIN POPE

customer_reviews.title: such fun colors when most wrestling shoes are black
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these... such fun colors when most wrestling shoes are black... helps me pick him out from the stands easier and super comfortable from a picky kid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit and look good. My son wears them for wrestling.
customer_reviews.author: Amdouglass

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with excellent traction on the mat. My son loves them. Got the maroon/gold to match his school colors. We ordered true to size and had to exchange because they were a half size too large.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Grippy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my high school son for wrestling. comfortable and grippy! Doesn't side when in a hold
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: using for boxing and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size, using for boxing and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased more then one!
customer_reviews.text: Look great fit perfect! Very comfortable, hold up great wish I had more pairs I would wear everyday
customer_reviews.author: Chef Chris Buchwald

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Great traction. My son would still be wearing them if he didnt grow out of them.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart after one month of practice! The entire toe is coming apart from the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Lahr

customer_reviews.title: Love'em
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing this shoes through two tournaments and several meets. He loves their fit and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis W Here

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son wore them to practice the same day he received them. He said they felt great on his feet but grip isn’t the best. (Review from a 10yr old)
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 90 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes did not last one high school wrestling season. The soles split on the right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great
customer_reviews.text: My Fiancé loves them! He moves so swift, fast and accurate pivots. I am very happy I picked them out for him!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Brown stains
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was supposed to be new but received them with a torn shoe lace and brownish stains on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at a great price and is sized larger than Asics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product was used when we got it. The sole had been broken off already and scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe. Bit snug.
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well, a little tight on the sides but with time I think it will be worn in quite well. Looks awesome, clean, we'll made.
customer_reviews.author: Rax

customer_reviews.title: On time delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew and he is very happy happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Lynniebear

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: Provides good ankle support but still flexible enough for fluid movement.
customer_reviews.author: Jory

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective but cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ran a little large so my son didn’t use them until this offseason for practice. After very little use the bottom of toe is already falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!! I have another pair of different Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect!! I have another pair of different Adidas. I was concerned the might vary in fit, but they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Soles are too stiff and hard rubber less able to grip mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to wear for wrestling and replace his old pair of adidas. However, the soles are extremely stiff and the rubber on bottom is very hard and seems less likely to grip the mat effectively. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Crump

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and the style is just what my son wanted but after 2 weeks of practice and 4 matches they are falling apart I have contacted adidas and have not heard anything back yet
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Sole blowout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the end of June for my son and he loved them at first. He wrestled 4 tournaments over the summer and practiced in them 2-3 days a week. Very disappointed in the quality after the sole completely came apart today, Sept 7th, after only 2 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: kenee pinzino

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for work out shoes to give me better ankle support worth every penny they fit well provide ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of ankle problems after a motorcycle accident so I bought these for work out shoes to give me better ankle support worth every penny they fit well provide excellent ankle support and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, will send used items marked as new
customer_reviews.text: This product came in and the shoes had clearly been worn before many times and then cleaned up and resold. Shoe laces had marks on them, the toe of a shoe had a split in the fabric, and there were scuff marks on both shoes in multiple locations. The product was marked as new as well. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: kellyokelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these sneakers for Leg & Back day at the gym. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Would put them against any wrestling shoe. Need to order a 1/2 size larger though.
customer_reviews.author: Orion B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loved them great shoes perfect size
customer_reviews.author: erika daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: Look good. Feel comfortable but definitely for mat use only. Sole is thin rubber so it wont take long till it starts to peel.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what my son wanted and they were a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: K.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I guess I’ll take those
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them, yet he was still bummed that they were out of like four pairs He try to pick out before he had to settle for this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, if I remember right I ordered a wide size
customer_reviews.text: To be honest with you I only trained one day so far, but I think they're going to be my best shoe, only did light training, I think I'm going to be very happy for the money I spent on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: They fit my son great, I ordered a half size bigger to get him through the wrestling season. He loved them because they are comfortable and his school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good. Husband don’t always wear this so i guess it’ll stay long.
customer_reviews.author: Jude’s

customer_reviews.title: Scuffles up easily
customer_reviews.text: Fits and feels great but they scuffed up pretty good in a matter of five minutes unlike any wrestling shoes I’ve purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... after he warms up and wrestle's they are perfectly fine. I remember from being a runner that when ...
customer_reviews.text: When my son receive the shoes they were a little big but after he warms up and wrestle's they are perfectly fine. I remember from being a runner that when you exercise your feet swell just a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy one larger
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Wrestling shoes. Perfect fit and quality is good. Go for one size larger for a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Hwt fits great !!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a wide foot and it is difficult to find wrestling shoes that he can fit. These at first looked like they wasn't going to fit him however not the case they fit him just like wrestling shoes should fit snug but not so tight that he can't feel his feet. Definitely recommend these shoes to those who have to go up in size to fit in width.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes was promoted as high quality and as such on the more expensive side.. They lasted a little more than a month into the season and fell apart. Just long enough so u can't return them. We've been wrestling for years and have never experienced this. We have a teamate who bought the same shoes and his failed too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We recommend Adidas for any age or level of wrestler
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! Adidas is the only wrestling shoe our family wears. The mat wizard line has far exceeded its self. We recommend Adidas for any age or level of wrestler.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alvy

customer_reviews.title: Laces are a problem
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint about this shoe is the laces. If they aren't triple knotted, they come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, soles harder than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but the soles are too hard to use on the mats at my gym, or head-kicking in mma. Probably great for wrestling, less great for mma practice.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: These did not last very long. My son tore ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not last very long. My son tore through the sole in a about 4 months. He only wears his shoes in the wrestling room, and on the mat. This was really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Clueless

customer_reviews.title: ... mats and they make you wrestle flat footed but great design and does good on cared for mats
customer_reviews.text: They don't have any grip on old mats and they make you wrestle flat footed but great design and does good on cared for mats.
customer_reviews.author: tungestxrz

customer_reviews.title: a little bit later the inside started peeling up so I had to super glue it down
customer_reviews.text: Half way through the season the tongue of the shoe on both ripped. I had to have them sown back in, a little bit later the inside started peeling up so I had to super glue it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look! But the width is narrow. If you typically need wide choose 2E!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thebe Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Sole too hard, doesn’t grip mat.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe did not grip mat well at all. Returned and it was done without any trouble.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They looked cool and fit well, but the laces were too long!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality / durability / design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , have been boxing in them for 6 months by now just like a new, dry well
customer_reviews.author: Ilya L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My son loves his new wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I just got them in and they fit very well(ordered a half size smaller than my previous two pair of Adidas wrestling shoes). They are extremely light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cody rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Buy an ASICS product
customer_reviews.text: If 2 months is life expectancy for a shoe, order this shoe! The sole has split already, can not recommend these, they are garbage. A shame too because my wrestler liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Quick

customer_reviews.title: your SSN, you got to know your SSN and your shoe size, that'll pay out big as time moves forwar
customer_reviews.text: They were just as I expected and arrived on time, what more can a fella ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Kit Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! These shoes didn't even last through the season. The bottom completely split!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good snug fit. True to size. If you're not a fan of a snug fit get half a size larger. Super light and looks really good
customer_reviews.author: O. Etkins Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for a new or intermediate level wrestler. Durable sole is a big plus. A little stiff in the beginning but once broken in they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The correct product arrived on time, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my grandson to wear in his first wrestling camp. He said they were "just right".

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of this shoe, but quality is poor, after wrestling for two weeks the inside felts started ripping out.

customer_reviews.text: The sole was too siippeery and was not fitting snug on my foot

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes really comfortable and easy to put on right away and don’t need to be broken in and are ready to go right away highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My son likes. He wished they had the pocket in the front.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Style
customer_reviews.text: As expected, the quality of this Adidas product is top-notch. Good support, good grip, flexible, and they look good.

customer_reviews.text: The material that the bottom of the shoe has on it is slippery on mats just don't like the shoe because of that.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrestling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wrestling shoes ,would be better with a lace pocket on the tounge .

customer_reviews.text: bought it for a gift from gear2compete and this is what i received, the shoes are used, the box is not even adidas.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit!!!!! Adidas is a great wrestling show. Thank you

product_meta.title: Adidas Mat Wizard David Taylor Edition Wrestling Shoes Grey-black-white
product_meta.description: Developed with the input of the Magic Man David Taylor, the Mat Wizard is the perfect
feature_bullets: V-shaped film, abrasion resistant TPU tapes.
Consistent surface contact, even at extreme angles
